## Easy cases


```{r}
#| label: fig-1-echo
#| fig-cap: A caption
plot(c(4,5,6))
```

See @fig-1-echo.

```{r}
#| label: fig-1
#| fig-cap: A caption
#| echo: false
plot(c(1,2,3))
```

```{r}
#| label: fig-2
#| fig-cap: A caption
#| fig-subcap: 
#|   - Subcap 1
#|   - Subcap 2
#| echo: false
plot(c(4,5,6))
plot(c(1,2,3))
```

```{r}
#| label: fig-3
#| fig-cap: A caption (with echo)
plot(c(1,2,3))
```

```{r}
#| label: fig-4
#| fig-cap: A caption (with echo)
#| fig-subcap: 
#|   - Subcap 1
#|   - Subcap 2
plot(c(4,5,6))
plot(c(1,2,3))
```

## Not-so-easy cases

```{r}
#| label: fig-5
#| echo: false
plot(c(4,5,6))
```

See @fig-5.

```{r}
#| echo: false
#| label: fig-6
#| fig-cap: A caption (no subcaptions)
plot(c(1,2,3))
plot(c(4,5,6))
```
